disinfectant.name: Reptile-Safe Disinfectant

spec.active: Safe for reptiles/amphibians when diluted properly

disinfectant.notes: Essential for monthly deep cleaning and quarantine protocols. F10SC is gold standard - kills bacteria, viruses, fungi without toxic residue. Always rinse thoroughly after use and let enclosure air dry completely. Never use Lysol, Pine-Sol, or other household cleaners - toxic to reptiles. Dilute per product instructions.

drainage-tray.name: Drainage Tray (Substrate Tray)

spec.purpose: Collects excess water from misting, prevents enclosure damage

minimum.description: Large plastic storage bin (as drainage catch)

recommended.description: Custom PVC drainage tray with bulkhead

ideal.description: Professional drainage tray system with plumbing
ideal.searchQuery: drainage tray system terrarium plumbing kit

drainage-tray.notes: Critical for large bioactive enclosures and chameleon setups with heavy misting. Prevents water damage to floors/furniture. DIY option: concrete mixing tub with hole drilled for drainage tube. Professional systems include bulkhead fittings and tubing to route water to collection bucket. Essential for paludariums and heavily-misted arboreal setups.
